mapper.insert: insert into qt_financial_borrow_money (id, productId, couponId, userId, amount, daynum,status, arriveAmount, auditCost, factorageCost, manageCost, reductionExemption, applyAt, createdAt) values (#{id}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{daynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arriveAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{auditCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{factorageCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{manageCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reductionExemption,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{applyAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, productId, couponId, userId, amount, daynum, status,arriveAmount, auditCost, factorageCost, manageCost, reductionExemption, applyAt, createdAt from qt_financial_borrow_money where id = #{id}
